_sText:
Introducing gg_greek. A simple, symmetrical map suited towards the gungame counter-strike source mod.

The map was produced in 2 hours as part of a small mapping competition with a few friends. The theme was "Temple", so I went with this iconic greek style. Sorry to those who know, but no, the columns are not tapered.

This is the final product, with no changes to the initial 2 hours worth of work.

The map plays well, is simple to learn, and is not dominated by any specific type of weapon or playstyle.

Have fun!
